channel.title: Lies on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Lies on Silence Speaks

item.title: Fool Yourself
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: You knew that they were joking, But over time, the lies took root. It's a belief you couldn't shake Without their Fate becoming Truth. You are what they say, And they've said quite a lot. The more you fight against it, The more that must be fought.
